pkgmetadata.longdescription: A 'DBI' Interface to the 'Yandex Clickhouse' Database Providing Basic 'dplyr' Support // 'Yandex Clickhouse' (https://clickhouse.yandex/) is a high-performance relational column-store database to enable big data exploration and 'analytics' scaling to petabytes of data. Methods are provided that enable working with 'Yandex Clickhouse' databases via 'DBI' 'methods' and using 'dplyr'/'dbplyr' idioms.
